name: Car Zone Car Selling Website
description: Car Zone is an intuitive online platform for buying and selling vehicles, connecting sellers with potential buyers through a user-friendly interface.

name: Lung Image Classifier
description: An advanced machine learning model developed to accurately sub-classify non-small cell lung cancer images into squamous cell carcinoma and adenocarcinoma, enhancing diagnostic precision for healthcare professionals.

name: Blog Website
description: A dynamic blog platform that allows users to create, edit, and share articles, fostering community engagement through comments and likes.

name: DNA Promoter Classifier
description: A deep learning project utilizing a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to accurately classify DNA promoter sequences, enhancing our understanding of gene transcription and its implications for human diseases.

name: InstaClone
description: A web application that emulates the core features of Instagram, such as posting and sharing photos, following other users, and liking posts, is developed using Flask.This application allows users to create accounts, upload photos, and interact with other users in a manner similar to Instagram. While the full suite of features may not be replicated, the fundamental aspects are implemented, providing a platform for users to engage in photo sharing and social networking.
